nodes.text: A blowgun was a weapon that was used to fire poison darts at an opponent. Treek used a blowgun to shoot fektur darts to heal others. Alema Rar used a blowgun during the Second Galactic Civil War to try and kill the members of the Skywalker family and the Solo family for how they had mutilated her, however her attempts had accidentally killed the World Brain and various civilians that were present at her assassination attempts.
